ABOUT

I am 22 years old. Currently I live in Prague, where I study Artificial Intelligence at the Department of Mathematics and Physics of the Charles University.

I focus on neural networks, especially Transformer models. In the future, I would like to work on the potental creation of Artificial General Intelligence, possibly with inspirations in the biological brain. I’ve been also experimenting with Quantum Computing lately.

I practice a lot of jazz piano. Occasionally I perform in public. I listen mostly to modern Scandinavian jazz and ECM/ACT style. My favourite pianists are Esbjörn Svensson and Brad Mehldau. Sometimes I reharmonize songs, and I have also done some composing.

I like fractals.
